name: U.F.D
description:
U.F.D is an action game where you take control of a U.F.O completing various levels in a total of 3 unique worlds.

For best experience on downloaded version go to the in game settings and hit reset progress as a bug made it so all the levels are unlocked right from the start

Controls: arrow keys for movement and if the pause button doesn't work you can use return to restart the level and backspace to go back to the main menu

Please Note! : The game doesn't work very well on the browser, recommend downloading it
